title: What champion should I buy first?
body:
Can anyone suggest me a champion to get with my first lot of IP?

They are expensive so I want to make my first one a good one that is fun to play and can fill different roles if needed.

Thankyou.

replies.body: Is  he worth 4800 ip? I am still saving up I am at 1989 IP currently still need to narrow down my choices.
Ok in that case go for someone like cho Gath he is a fun as champ
Buy janna, sona, and nami and play support you'll be good at it trust me
Which one first? I only have 1400 ip I will need to save

Janna, Ardent Censor is a support item that she builds and it's really overpowered right now. If you abuse it then you will carry games easy. I'm pretty sure Ardent Censor can be built on sona and nami as well. But mainly Janna and Ardent Censor are the two things you want to be abusing right now.
If you're new to the game then don't play adc. Buy Annie and go mid
I have been playing free champion Diana and I play Lux today which was fun support.
Try other mage champions like Annie or Morgana, they are cheap and fairly easy to pick up.
What role do you want to play and what type of champion do you enjoy? mage,tank.. ect
